description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级党和国家领导人。现任中共中央政治局委员、中共广东省委书记。其被认为是习近平派系“闽江新军”的主要成员之一。
description.en: A politician of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, a sub-national level party and state leader. Currently a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and the Party Secretary of Guangdong Province. He is considered one of the main members of the Xi Jinping faction known as the 'Minjiang New Army'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。黄坤明在福建和浙江任职期间曾与习近平长期共事，被视为其重要亲信。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. Huang Kunming worked with Xi Jinping for a long time during his tenure in Fujian and Zhejiang and is regarded as one of his key confidants.

nodes.id: 中国共产党广东省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党广东省委员会
en: Guangdong Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广东省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Guangdong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局常委。黄坤明的前任广东省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee. Huang Kunming's predecessor as the Party Secretary of Guangdong.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会宣传部

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会宣传部
en: Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管意识形态方面工作的综合职能部门。
description.en: The comprehensive functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for ideology-related work.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄坤明的前任中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Huang Kunming's predecessor as the Minister of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄坤明的继任中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Huang Kunming's successor as the Minister of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党杭州市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党杭州市委员会
en: Hangzhou Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在杭州市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Hangzhou City.

nodes.id: 中国共产党嘉兴市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党嘉兴市委员会
en: Jiaxing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在嘉兴市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Jiaxing City.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国福建省福州市的一所公立大学。
description.en: A public university located in Fuzhou, Fujian Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 对中华人民共和国第5代领导集体中，拥有在福建省工作经验的，特别是曾与习近平共事的中共干部的称呼。
description.en: A term referring to CCP cadres in the 5th generation of the leadership collective of the People's Republic of China who have work experience in Fujian Province, especially those who have worked with Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 指在中国共产党内，以现任总书记习近平为首的政治派系。
description.en: Refers to the political faction within the Communist Party of China led by the current General Secretary Xi Jinping.

en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and its Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 黄坤明之父，曾参加中国工农红军，长期担任福建龙岩地委副书记。
description.en: Father of Huang Kunming. He participated in the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and served for a long time as the Deputy Secretary of the Longyan Prefectural Committee in Fujian.

description.zh-cn: 黄坤明之妻，曾任共青团福建龙岩市委书记、共青团福建省委副书记、浙江省烟草专卖局党组书记等职。
description.en: Wife of Huang Kunming. She previously served as Secretary of the Fujian Longyan Municipal Committee of the Communist Youth League, Deputy Secretary of the Fujian Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League, and Party Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Tobacco Monopoly Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，1999年与黄坤明一同被调往浙江省任职。在黄坤明担任杭州市委书记期间，蔡奇曾是其副手。
description.en: Chinese politician. In 1999, he was transferred to Zhejiang Province along with Huang Kunming. During Huang Kunming's tenure as Hangzhou Party Secretary, Cai Qi served as his deputy.

description.zh-cn: 指中国政府为应对2019冠状病毒病疫情所采取的一系列严厉防控措施。据报道，黄坤明曾向习近平反映尽快结束该政策的紧迫性。
description.en: Refers to a series of strict control measures taken by the Chinese government in response to the COVID-19 pandemic. It is reported that Huang Kunming conveyed the urgency of ending this policy to Xi Jinping.

nodes.id: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党浙江省委员会
en: Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在浙江省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Zhejiang Province.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广东省委员会

description.zh-cn: 2022年10月，黄坤明接替李希出任中共广东省委书记。
description.en: In October 2022, Huang Kunming succeeded Li Xi as the Secretary of the CPC Guangdong Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 黄坤明接替李希担任中共广东省委书记，构成职务接替关系。
description.en: Huang Kunming succeeded Li Xi as the Secretary of the CPC Guangdong Provincial Committee, constituting a successor-predecessor relationship.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 自2017年10月中共十九届一中全会起，黄坤明连续当选为第十九届、第二十届中央政治局委员。
description.en: Starting from the First Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the CCP in October 2017, Huang Kunming was successively elected as a member of the 19th and 20th Politburo.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会宣传部

description.zh-cn: 黄坤明于2013年10月调任中宣部副部长，2014年12月升任常务副部长，2017年10月至2022年10月担任部长。
description.en: Huang Kunming was transferred to be Deputy Minister of the Central Propaganda Department in October 2013, promoted to Executive Deputy Minister in December 2014, and served as Minister from October 2017 to October 2022.

description.zh-cn: 在刘奇葆担任中宣部部长期间，黄坤明是其副手。
description.en: During Liu Qibao's tenure as Minister of the Central Propaganda Department, Huang Kunming was his deputy.

relationships.target: 中国共产党杭州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 黄坤明于2010年1月至2013年10月担任中共杭州市委书记。
description.en: Huang Kunming served as the Secretary of the CPC Hangzhou Municipal Committee from January 2010 to October 2013.

relationships.target: 中国共产党嘉兴市委员会

description.zh-cn: 黄坤明于2003年3月至2007年9月担任中共嘉兴市委书记。
description.en: Huang Kunming served as the Secretary of the CPC Jiaxing Municipal Committee from March 2003 to September 2007.

description.zh-cn: 黄坤明长期在福建、浙江与习近平有共事经历，被广泛认为是习近平派系“闽江新军”的主要成员和习的重要亲信之一。
description.en: Huang Kunming has a long history of working with Xi Jinping in Fujian and Zhejiang and is widely regarded as a key member of the Xi Jinping faction 'Minjiang New Army' and one of Xi's important confidants.

description.zh-cn: 习近平出任中共中央总书记后，将黄坤明上调至中共中央宣传部任职，为黄坤明在四年后接任部长作铺垫。
description.en: After Xi Jinping became General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, he promoted Huang Kunming to a position in the Central Propaganda Department, paving the way for Huang to take over as minister four years later.

description.zh-cn: 黄坤明被广泛认为是闽江新军的主要成员。
description.en: Huang Kunming is widely considered to be a key member of the Minjiang New Army.

description.zh-cn: 因为黄坤明长期在福建、浙江与习近平有共事经历，是习近平派系的主要成员。
description.en: Due to his long working experience with Xi Jinping in Fujian and Zhejiang, Huang Kunming is a key member of the Xi Jinping faction.

degree.en: Graduated from the Department of Political Education

degree.zh-cn: 公共管理学专业管理学博士
degree.en: Doctor of Management in Public Administration

description.zh-cn: 黄德彪是黄坤明的父亲。
description.en: Huang Debiao is Huang Kunming's father.

description.zh-cn: 邱萍是黄坤明的妻子。
description.en: Qiu Ping is Huang Kunming's wife.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，黄坤明于2022年底向习近平反映尽快结束清零政策的紧迫性，间接推动了该政策的终结。
description.en: It is reported that at the end of 2022, Huang Kunming conveyed the urgency of ending the Zero-COVID policy to Xi Jinping, indirectly contributing to the termination of the policy.

description.zh-cn: 在黄坤明担任中共杭州市委书记期间，蔡奇是其副手，担任副书记兼市长。
description.en: During Huang Kunming's tenure as Secretary of the CPC Hangzhou Municipal Committee, Cai Qi was his deputy, serving as Deputy Secretary and Mayor.
